data.title: Crime in Natal
data.meta_description: Information about crime in Natal, Brazil. Shows how much people think the problem in their community are property crimes (home broken, car theft, etc.), violent crimes (being mugged or robbed, being attacked or insulted), corruption and other crimes.
data.text:
Crime in Natal, Brazil

Crime rates in Natal, Brazil

Level of crime91.14 Very High Crime increasing in the past 5 years79.63 High Worries home broken and things stolen66.25 High Worries being mugged or robbed90.31 Very High Worries car stolen79.01 High Worries things from car stolen77.47 High Worries attacked61.42 High Worries being insulted46.75 Moderate Worries being subject to a physical attack because of your skin color, ethnic origin, gender or religion29.87 Low Problem people using or dealing drugs69.74 High Problem property crimes such as vandalism and theft79.63 High Problem violent crimes such as assault and armed robbery91.67 Very High Problem corruption and bribery90.91 Very High

Safety in Natal, Brazil

Safety walking alone during daylight36.11 Low Safety walking alone during night10.49 Very Low

Contributors: 81

Last update: July 2024

These data are based on perceptions of visitors of this website in the past 5 years.

If the value is 0, it means it is perceived as very low, and if the value is 100, it means it is perceived as very high.
